ðŸ“– Summary: Nakama is a distributed server designed for building social and realtime games and applications. It provides a comprehensive suite of features including user authentication, data storage, social networking, realtime chat and multiplayer, leaderboards, tournaments, and in-app notifications. Nakama can be extended with custom logic written in Lua, TypeScript/JavaScript, or Go, and supports deployment to any cloud provider.
